document.full_text: a small bomb exploded near egypt's pyramids outside cairo on wednesday, badly injuring three peddlers who the police said were trying to open the device's casing.
document.title: middle east: egypt: blast near pyramids
lines_and_colors: a small bomb exploded near egypt's pyramids outside cairo on wednesday, badly injuring three peddlers who the police said were trying to open the device's casing.
